items.title: What makes AI romance more addictive than real love?

items.title: Insta360 now offers lens filters and a larger battery for its 360-degree action cam
items.summary: Insta360 has introduced new accessories and a major firmware update for its X5 360-degree action camera, including lens filters and a larger battery. The update also includes a new AdaptiveTone feature for improved color and detail.

items.summary: Scale AI recently laid off 14% of its workforce, raising questions about its future following Meta's investment. Scale AI founder Alexandr Wang was seen at Allen and Co.'s Sun Valley conference last year.

items.summary: The Nintendo eShop's failure to protect from 'eslop' has indie devs concerned about the impact on their work, as they believe Steam's algorithm handles AI slop better by burying it in a list of releases.

items.summary: Free AI training will be provided to 5.5 lakh village entrepreneurs by the government under the IndiaAI Mission, with the goal of skilling 10 lakh individuals. The initiative focuses on village-level entrepreneurs who offer essential digital services.

items.summary: Fortnite's new limited game mode offers an incentive for players to log in, using AI-generated voice. The v36.20 update was released after downtime.

items.title: Warning Issued As Hundreds of Thousands Told to Stay Out of the Water
items.summary: More than 270,000 people in three states were warned to stay out of Lake Superior's waters due to dangerous conditions, with the warning being generated by an AI voice. National Weather Service lead meteorologist mentioned the inconsistencies that may occur with AI-generated messages.
